class.name: KotlinScriptFileBuildStep
class.description: A build step running a Kotlin script with from a specified file

function.name: kotlinFile
function.description: Adds a build step running a Kotlin script from a specified file @see KotlinScriptFileBuildStep

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for the script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: scriptFile
param.description: A path to a file with .main.kts extension

param.name: kotlinArgs
param.description: Space-separated list of additional arguments for Kotlin script

param.name: target.jdk.home
param.description: Custom [JDK](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Predefined+Build+Parameters#PredefinedBuildParameters-DefiningJava-relatedEnvironmentVariables) to use. The default is JAVA_HOME environment variable or the agent's own Java.

param.name: jvmArgs
param.description: Space-separated list of additional arguments for JVM

example.description: Adds a Kotlin script build step with [defualt Kotlin compiler](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Kotlin+Script#Prerequisites) and default JVM.

Adds a Kotlin script build step with [bundled Kotlin compiler](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Kotlin+Script#Prerequisites) and custom JDK is set to the [environment variable](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Using+Build+Parameters) value with additional parameter. Additional agruments are passed to the Kotlin script with a reference to the [configuration parameter](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Using+Build+Parameters) value. Custom [working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) is provided.

Adds a Kotlin script build step with custom Kotlin compiler and custom JDK with additional parameter. Custom [working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) is provided.
